archetypes.name: Vegetarian Family Weeknight Mild (15–30)
archetypes.description: Quick, kid-friendly vegetarian dinners for a family of four with familiar South African and American flavors, ready in 15–30 minutes with simple steps.
archetypes.rationale: Establishes a mainstream, high-appeal baseline for vegetarian family weeknights—simple, mild, and 15–30 minutes—covering core everyday demand early in the set.
